subject: Boxing
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: An outpouring of tributes and a new documentary about his life, “When the Smoke Clears,” have given Frazier an eloquence in death that often eluded him in life.
snippet: An outpouring of tributes and a new documentary about his life, “When the Smoke Clears,” have given Frazier an eloquence in death that often eluded him in life.
